name: TPOK Jazz
description: '''OK Jazz''', later renamed '''TPOK Jazz''' (short for ''Tout Puissant Orchestre Kinois de Jazz''), was a [[Congolese rumba]] band from the [[Democratic Republic of the Congo]] established in 1956 and fronted by [[Franco Luambo|Franco]]. As noted by Congolese musicologist Clément Ossinondé, the band dissolved by August 2004.
